comment.author: 64403351@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/angeljim46] I think that's a different steamer. Note the shorter funnel relative to the masts. That one could be the SS Kianga. www.flickr.com/photos/41311545@N05/4326146903/ I think this steamer is the SS Bergalia, the last coastal timber freighter serving Batemans Bay until 1957.
